name: Diana Shipping Inc.
description: Diana Shipping Inc. is a global provider of shipping transportation services through its ownership of dry bulk vessels. Founded in 1999 and based in Athens, Greece, the company specializes in the transportation of a variety of dry bulk commodities, including iron ore, coal, and grains. Diana Shipping operates a fleet of modern, high-quality vessels, which are equipped with advanced technologies to enhance efficiency and safety. The company is committed to maintaining high operational standards while adhering to environmental regulations and sustainability practices. Diana Shipping aims to capitalize on trends in the shipping industry by leveraging its strategic fleet management and operational expertise. Its business model focuses on long-term charters, providing stable revenue streams. With an emphasis on transparency and shareholder value, Diana Shipping is dedicated to enhancing its financial performance through prudent capital allocation and operational excellence. The company is also active in investor relations, ensuring that shareholders are well-informed about its strategic initiatives and market developments.

seo.meta_title: Diana Shipping Inc. | Leading Dry Bulk Shipping Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Diana Shipping Inc., a premier provider of dry bulk shipping services. Discover our fleet, commitment to sustainability, and market strategies.

faq.question: What services does Diana Shipping provide?
faq.answer: Diana Shipping provides shipping transportation services for dry bulk commodities through its fleet of vessels.

faq.question: Where is Diana Shipping headquartered?
faq.answer: Diana Shipping is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Diana Shipping?
faq.answer: Ioannis Zafirakis is the CEO of Diana Shipping Inc.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Diana Shipping operate?
faq.answer: Diana Shipping operates Panamax, Capesize, and Supramax vessels.
